Currently I'm analyzing data to identify risk factors for chronic pain as part of the [DOLORisk](http://dolorisk.eu/) project. The data sets contain a Cohort Profile in the International Journal of Epidemiology describing lifestyle, medical history, prescribing, genotype, cognitive function and psychology.
